item.title: Visions and goals
item.description: Visions and goals My former workplace has a self-improvement program called “Visions and goals”. We’d write a vision (or two) outlining what our future would look like, before writing some short-term SMART goals to hit before a certain timeframe (in the workplace’s case, every four months or a quarter). The visions would then be published on a company-wide spreadsheet where we’d be held accountable for them near the end of each quarter.
